summary: This document is an email chain from January 2021 within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY), discussing updates to a 'PCU Case Tracker' spreadsheet. It involves a paralegal specialist and other office personnel coordinating case information.

events.title: PCU Case Tracker Update Coordination
events.description: Email exchange among SDNY personnel regarding the updating and distribution of a 'PCU Case Tracker' spreadsheet containing case details.

locations.name: U.S. Attorney's Office SDNY
locations.address: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007

keyFacts: The document is internal correspondence from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York dated January 2021.
It references a 'PCU Case Tracker' spreadsheet being updated and shared among office personnel.
The correspondence indicates ongoing case management activity within the SDNY, potentially related to the Epstein case or other investigations.
A paralegal specialist is coordinating the collection of case details from various personnel.
